## Projection.reprojectPoint() method

Reproject a world position from the given source \[\[Projection\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reprojectPoint(sourceProjection: Projection, worldPos: Vector3Like): Vector3Like;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sourceProjection | [Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) | The source projection. |
|  worldPos | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | A valid world position for the given source projection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md)

The world position reprojected using this \[\[Projection\]\].
